topic: TS API Data Fetcher Bot Error
type: TS API Data Fetcher Bot Error - API Map Reference Node Missing

definition.text: The node where this error occured needs to have a child of type API Map Reference referencing the API Map. This API Map will tell the bot how to locate the API Server and how to extract data from it.

paragraphs.text: In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
